multiple_choice.question: What did little ant not have for many days?
What did the ant do to save the dove?

fill_in_the_blanks.question: It was a hot summer day in the dry forest
Little Ant took a long sip of cool water
White Dove was startled and flew away to safety

meanings.sweep: move or push something with great force
meanings.tuft: a bunch or collection of grass
meanings.splashing: a sound made by something striking or falling into liquid
